worksContent2: Why 'frontend'? I like to see the result of my actions: beautiful, animated and functional websites appear on the clean page of the browser.
workstools: React, Next.js, TypeScript, RTK Query, SWR, HTML, CSS, SASS/SCSS, Git, GitHub, Docker
worksContent5: and something remains a line of code in
worksContent6: My most important project is LKS - Little Knits Story, which started in May 2021, my journey from theory and courses to the real challenges of today. It was several startups, we were creating a blog about knitting, another project - a social network for cosplayers, and one of the projects - a landing page. I was developing new functionality on the React framework, supporting or refactoring old functionality, participating in discussions about the new design, assigning tasks, and teamwork.
worksListLKS: This project has given me a lot:
